title: The Magnate

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose an Elite player. You add the exact action they perform tonight to your Project.
- At night, you may perform the Project, repeating all actions stored inside in any order. You may choose the targets.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Appears innocent
- The Project can contain any number of actions.
- You don't appear to visit anyone the night you perform the Project.
- Actions remain in the Project permanently, even after you perform the Project.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all opposition to the Elites.

desc:
Post 4898
*Resources are valuable - to not use them is to waste them entirely. I don't intend to sit by while the world turns to dust.*
- The Personification of Industry
